title: Requires sex offenders who fail to register or verify twice or more to wear a location-tracking device
summary: Requires sex offenders who fail to register or verify their registration on two or more occasions to wear a location-tracking device while on probation, parole, conditional release or post-release supervision; failure to wear such device shall be a class D felony and grounds for revocation of parole and probation.
